{PAWN_nameDef} the immune system is severely defective,{PAWN_pronoun} immunity is almost non-existent,Almost the slightest illness can kill them.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_2.degreeDatas.0.label: Mental mania
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_2.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef}It is difficult to control their spirit, and they often vent their unprovoked anger to the people around them regardless of the occasion.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_NoValue.degreeDatas.0.label: Not worth a penny
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_NoValue.degreeDatas.0.descrip: For unknown reasons,{PAWN_nameDef}No matter what amazing feats are made,{PAWN_pronoun}'s worth will not change one iota, even in the slave market, no one will want to buy them{PAWN_pronoun}.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_4.degreeDatas.0.label: Frigophobia
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_4.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} Weak resistance to cold, easily frostbitten.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_5.degreeDatas.0.label: Thermophobia
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_5.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} Weak resistance to hot environment, easily burned.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_Nonsense.degreeDatas.0.label: Bar fine
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_Nonsense.degreeDatas.0.descri: {PAWN_nameDef}Likes to get pleasure by raising arguments, always likes to ignore or misinterpret others' logic to anger others.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_9.degreeDatas.0.label: Math Idiot
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_9.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef}There are some defects in the part of the brain that is used for computation, and there are always some mistakes when doing trading or computational work.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_10.degreeDatas.0.label: Physical deformities
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_10.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef}The body is like the scene of a serious car accident, and {PAWN_pronoun} is weaker than normal in all areas due to limb deformities.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_12.degreeDatas.0.label: arrogance
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_12.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} Self-esteem, think they know everything and does not need to learn.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_14.degreeDatas.0.label: lust for sex
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_14.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef}Very greedy for lust, if you do not have more than one lover, you will be very miserable.
